summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2007 HYUNDAI SONATA. THE VEHICLE FAILED STATE INSPECTION BECAUSE THE HIGH MOUNTED REAR STOP LIGHT BULB FAILED.  THE OWNERS MANUAL DOES NOT INCLUDE OPERATIONAL INSTRUCTIONS ON REPLACEMENT OF THE HIGH MOUNTED REAR STOP LIGHT BULB.  HE WAS IN THE PROCESS OF NOTIFYING THE MANUFACTURER. THE FAILURE AND CURRENT MILEAGES WERE 48,221.
